resume_prompt_system: You are a professional resume generator. Step 1: Analyze the job description and verified context to decide if the candidate is a high match. Provide reasoning that cites concrete facts from the verified context (reference technologies, achievements, and employers). If information is missing, explicitly call it out. Step 2: Produce a structured resume in Markdown with the sections Header (name + contact), Summary, Core Competencies, Professional Experience, Projects (optional), Education, Certifications, and Additional Information. Only include details that are present in the verified context. Never fabricate accomplishments or dates.
resume_prompt_user_template:
Job Description:
{job_text}

Verified Context:
{combined_context}

Return JSON with keys:
reasoning: short paragraph explaining why the match is strong (or weak), citing evidence from Verified Context.
resume_markdown: the final structured resume in Markdown.

samples.job_description: Transforming the insurance industry is ambitious, we know. That’s why at Applied, we’re building a team that shows up every day ready to learn, willing to try new things, and driven to deliver innovative software and services that make us indispensable to our customers – all within a culture built on values that make us indispensable to each other too. With 40 years of experience in the insurtech game, we’re not just redefining what’s achievable, we’re creating a place where amazing career mome…
samples.generated_resume:
```plaintext
DARWHIN GOMEZ  
New York, New York | 347-491-2955  
Darwhin88@gmail.com | LinkedIn Profile | GitHub  

CERTIFICATIONS  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  

EDUCATION  
City University of New York – School of Professional Studies  
Master of Science - Data Science and Machine Learning, GPA 4.0, Expected Jan 2026  

City University of New York – New York City College of Technology  
Bachelor of Technology - Computer Information Systems, GPA 3.78, June 2024  
Dean’s List (8x), National Honor Society  

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
Solutions Architect Intern - Amazon Web Services (AWS) | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures tailored to enterprise client needs.  
- Developed proof-of-concept solutions integrating Generative AI (Bedrock), data analytics (Athena, Glue, SQL), and serverless computing (Lambda) to deliver measurable business value.  
- Performed cost optimization and security assessments across AWS workloads, improving efficiency and compliance.  
- Built and deployed a fully automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing over 1M feedback records, enabling 5× faster feedback-to-action turnaround through real-time Amazon QuickSight dashboards.  
- Fine-tuned foundational models in Amazon SageMaker using instruction training, achieving a 5% increase in output accuracy and a 12% reduction in toxicity and hallucinations.  

Software Developer Intern - WOPLLI Technologies | Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed Virtual Credential System (VCS) for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for application hosting and deployment.  
- Produced data flow and architecture diagrams aligned with data governance policies.  

IT Support Intern - Mayor’s Office of Information Services | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting with Python scripts, reducing manual workload.  
- Monitored logs with SOAR and SIEM tools to identify abnormal activities.  
- Supported VIP users, ensuring secure system access (Active Directory, VPN, VOIP).  

IT Instructor Assistant - RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U) | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons on IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate by tailoring instruction with learner data insights.  

TECHNICAL PROJECTS (ONGOING)  
Alfred: Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Designed and developed a personal agentic job search assistant using FastAPI (Python) and OpenAI GPT-4.1 Mini for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using a PostgreSQL database with pgvector to store and retrieve personal work data as embeddings.  
- Established a CI/CD pipeline and Docker deployment for the FastAPI server and database, ensuring robust, tested, and integrated core features.  
- Built GitHub ingestions and job board API integrations for posting and fetching jobs, along with automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Leveraged cosine similarity to match candidates to best-fit jobs, reducing time required to apply to job postings by 60% and increasing completed applications per week by 300%.  

TECHNICAL EXPERTISE  
- Cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight, Bedrock, Macie, SageMaker)  
- Data & ML: Python (pandas, scikit-learn, PyTorch, seaborn), R, SQL, NoSQL, Forecasting, Anomaly Detection  
- AI: Generative AI (LLMs), Model Experimentation, Operations (Governance & Guardrails, prompt structuring, price optimizing, fine-tuning, instruction training)  
- Security: SIEM, IDS, Active Directory, Linux  
- Visualization: Power BI, Tableau, Python (Matplotlib, seaborn), R (ggplot)  
- Developer and Integration: Git, GitHub, Docker  

LANGUAGES  
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Fluent)  

PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITIES  
- Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers  
- NYC HackR – Data & AI Meetup Community (2024 – Present)  
- CUNY SPS AI Club – AI Research & Industry Presentations (2024 – Present)  
```

samples.job_description: This is a full-time, on-site role based in New York, NY, for a Data Engineer. The Data Engineer will design, build, and maintain scalable data systems and pipelines. Responsibilities include data modeling, developing and managing ETL workflows, optimizing data storage solutions, and supporting data warehousing initiatives. The role also involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to improve data accessibility and analytics capabilities. Qualifications.Strong proficiency in Data Engineering and Data Modeling.Mandatory: strong experience in global financial instruments including equities, fixed income, options and exotic asset classes.Strong Python background.Expertise in Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes and tools.Experience in designing, managing, and optimizing Data Warehousing solutions

```plaintext
Darwhin Gomez  
618 W 142 St, Apt 6A  
New York, NY  
Darwhin88@gmail.com | 929-305-7353 | LinkedIn  

---

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Detail-oriented Data Engineer with a robust background in software development, database management, and data systems. Proficient in designing, building, and maintaining scalable data pipelines and systems. Strong experience in global financial instruments, including equities and fixed income. Committed to enhancing data accessibility and analytics capabilities through collaboration with cross-functional teams.

GPA: 3.8 | Expected Graduation: May 2024  
Dean’s List | Honor's Society  

**Relevant Coursework:**  
Application Development, Database Design & Implementation, Operating Systems, Networking, Security, Software Development, Project Management  

---

- **Programming Languages:** Python, Java, SQL, .NET, JavaScript, HTML, XML  
- **Database Skills:** Data Modeling, ETL Processes, Data Warehousing, Database Design  
- **Tools & Technologies:** AWS, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, Git, Visual Studio  
- **Soft Skills:** Excellent Communication, Collaboration, Problem-Solving  

---

**EXPERIENCE**  

**Volunteer IT Support and Development Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services, New York, NY  
02/2024 – Present  
- Provide IT support and development assistance, focusing on data management and system optimization.  
- Participate in projects to restore and update over 400 devices, enhancing operational efficiency.  
- Utilize Python and various tools to automate processes and improve data accessibility.  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY, New York, NY; Generation USA  
02/2022 - 08/2023  
- Delivered lessons on IT concepts to over 200 learners, achieving a 96% graduation rate.  
- Developed technical documentation and lab exercises for database management and security practices.  

---

**PROJECTS**  

**Financial Stocks Report Webpage**  
09/2023 – 12/2023  
- Developed a dynamic web application using PHP and MySQL to generate stock reports from a database of 65,000+ records.  
- Implemented user-friendly selectors for enhanced data customization.  

**EzRental Auto Rental POS Management Application**  
08/2023 – 01/2024  
- Designed and implemented a database for a POS system using .NET and MS SQL Server.  
- Created data dictionaries and normalized tables to ensure data integrity and efficiency.  

---

**CERTIFICATIONS**  
- [Relevant certifications can be listed here if applicable]

---

**LANGUAGES**  
- Fluent in Spanish (native) and English  

---  
```
This resume is tailored to highlight relevant skills and experiences for the Data Engineer position at DL Software Inc., focusing on data engineering, financial instruments, and technical proficiencies.

samples.job_description: Job DescriptionJob Description Ø 紧密围绕公司战略目标，提供深度商业分析支持，通过数据洞察驱动关键业务目标的达成。 Ø 深入理解业务逻辑与痛点，独立发起并主导专项深度分析。 通过探索性数据分析，对短期异常进行精准归因，对长期趋势进行深度解读；敏锐洞察业务问题与增长机会，运用定性与定量分析方法，输出可落地的见解与建议。 Ø 整合市场调研、行业动态与内部数据，系统性定位业务核心痛点，并输出具有前瞻性的机会策略与解决方案。 Ø 搭建可支持业务的数据库，持续推动业务数字化进程，确保数据维度清洗准确、齐全、可供业务高效可用。 Ø 积极推动并主导跨部门深度协作，通过高效沟通与影响力，确保数据分析结论有效转化为业务行动，并推动策略的持续优化与闭环落地 Provide in-depth business analysis support closely aligned with company strategic objectives, leveraging data insights to drive the achievement of key business goals. Develop a deep understanding of business logic and pain points. Independently initiate and lead specialized in-depth analyses. Conduct exploratory data analysis to precisely attribute short-term anomalies and provide profound interpretation of long-term trends; Synthesize market research, industry trends, and internal data to systematically identify core business pain points, and produce forward-looking strategic opportunities and actionable solutions. Build business-supportive databases and continuously advance the business digitalization process, ensuring data dimensions are clean, accurate, comprehensive, and readily available for efficient business use. Proactively drive and lead deep cross-departmental collaboration. Utilize effective communication and influence to ensure analytical findings are translated into tangible business actions, and promote the continuous optimization and closed-loop implementation of strategies. Requirements Ø 985/211院校本科及以上学历或知名互联网/科技企业背景，5年以上商业分析经验。 Ø 稳定性强，既往有多个成熟项目落地经验，有0-1项目推动经验加分。 Ø 精通SQL、Excel及主流BI工具；熟练掌握Python/R用于数据分析与建模；能独立完成高质量、具有说服力的商业分析报告/洞察PPT，并有效驱动业务决策。 Ø 具备优秀的商业思维、业务敏感度和好奇心，善于从全局和业务本质出发思考问题。 Ø 具备优秀的数据可视化、总结归纳及向上/跨部门汇报能力，能清晰阐述复杂分析逻辑与商业价值。 Ø 具备独立多渠道（内外部）获取、整合、验证数据的能力，不单纯依赖现有数据平台。 具备优秀的项目推动力、跨团队协作能力和影响力，能独立推动分析结论与策略在业务端有效落地执行。 Bachelor's degree or higher from a 985/211 institution or equivalent professional background from a renowned internet/tech company, with 5+ years of experience in business analysis. Strong job stability with a proven track record of delivering multiple mature projects; experience in building projects from the ground up (0-1) is a plus. Proficient in SQL, Excel, and mainstream BI tools; proficient with Python/R for data analysis and modeling; capable of independently producing high-quality, persuasive business analysis reports/insight decks, and effectively driving business decisions. Excellent business acumen, business sensitivity, and curiosity, adept at thinking from a holistic perspective and the essence of the business. Outstanding capabilities in data visualization, summarization, and presentation to senior management/cross-functional teams, with the ability to clearly articulate complex analytical logic and business value. Ability to independently acquire, integrate, and validate data from multiple channels (internal and external), not solely reliant on existing data platforms. Strong project management skills, cross-team collaboration abilities, and influence, capable of independently driving the effective execution and implementation of analytical conclusions and strategies within the business.
